automata.textmode.art.title: automata.textmode.art
automata.textmode.art.description: Create and explore cellular automata in ASCII. Design custom rulesets, watch characters evolve into mesmerizing patterns, and generate unique textmode art in your browser.
automata.textmode.art.author: humanbydefinition

textmode-flok.title: flok.cc: Live coding with textmode.js
textmode-flok.description: Real-time collaborative live coding platform integrating textmode.js with Hydra visuals and Strudel audio. Code audio-reactive ASCII art with friends in your browser.
textmode-flok.author: humanbydefinition
